title: mStore Feedback Schema
description: Defines the structure for a single feedback document in the 'feedbacks' collection.

$schema.description: A reference to this schema file for validation and documentation purposes.

meta.description: Core metadata about the feedback document.

feedbackId.description: The unique identifier for the feedback, following the global ID format (e.g., FDB-...).

flags.description: Boolean flags to track the state of the feedback.

guest.description: True if the feedback was submitted by a non-logged-in user.

links.description: References to other related documents, like the submitter's IDs.

userId.description: The user ID of the person taking the action, regardless of their role.

merchantId.description: The merchant ID of the submitter, if the submitter is a merchant.

submitter.description: Information about the user who submitted the feedback.

id.description: The primary identifier of the submitter. This will be the userId for consumers/admins, and the merchantId for merchants. Null for guests.

role.description: The role of the user at the time of submission.

submittedAt.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp when the feedback was submitted.

details.description: The actual content of the feedback.

subject.description: The subject of the feedback, often the item name or a general topic.

message.description: The detailed message provided by the user.

sentiment.description: The sentiment of the message, which can be analyzed later.

attachments.description: An array of objects for attached files, containing URL, name, type, and size.

phone.description: The contact phone number, primarily for guest users.

lifecycle.description: Tracks the administrative lifecycle of the feedback.

status.description: The current status of the feedback.

history.description: A log of all status changes and actions taken on the feedback.

note.description: An optional note about the status change.
